alert.note: Alert for Howell (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 12:58AM CDT until September 06 at 1:15AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CDT FOR HOWELL COUNTY... At 1257 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Willow Springs to near West Plains to near Ott, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... West Plains, Mountain View, Willow Springs, Pomona, South Fork, Brandsville, Peace Valley, Lanton, Pottersville, Caulfield, Siloam Springs, White Church and Moody. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
